hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct s from Street s left join fetch s.nameTemporals t left join fetch t.value v left join fetch v.translations tr left join fetch s.typeTemporals tt left join fetch tt.value tv left join fetch tv.translations ttr where t.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and (tt is null or tt.invalidDate ='2100-12-31') and s.status=? and s.parent.id=?
select count(*) from Street s where s.status=? and s.parent.id=?

select distinct s from Street s join fetch s.parent left join fetch s.nameTemporals t left join fetch t.value v left join fetch v.translations tr left join fetch s.districts where s.id=? and s.status=0 and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31'

select distinct s from Street s join fetch s.parent left join fetch s.nameTemporals t left join fetch t.value v left join fetch v.translations tr where s.id in (:ids) and s.status=0 and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31'

select distinct stt from StreetTypeTemporal stt left join fetch stt.value v left join fetch v.translations where stt.object.id=? and stt.object.status=0 and stt.invalidDate='2100-12-31' order by stt.createDate

select distinct d from Street s left join s.districts d left join fetch d.nameTemporals dt left join fetch dt.value dv left join fetch dv.translations where s.id=? and s.status=0 and dt.invalidDate='2100-12-31'

select distinct s from Street s left join s.nameTemporals t left join t.value v left join v.translations tr left join s.typeTemporals tt where s.status=0 and s.parent.id=? and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and upper(tr.name)=? and tt.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and tt.value.id=?

select distinct s from Street s left join fetch s.nameTemporals t left join fetch t.value v left join fetch v.translations tr left join fetch s.typeTemporals tt left join fetch tt.value tv left join fetch tv.translations ttr where s.status=0 and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and s.parent.id=? and upper(tr.name) like ?

select distinct s from Street s left join s.nameTemporals t left join t.value v left join v.translations tr left join s.typeTemporals tt where s.status=0 and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and s.parent.id=? and tr.name=? and tt.value.id=? and tr.lang.id=?
delete from StreetTypeTemporal t where t.object.id=?
delete from StreetNameTemporal t where t.object.id=?
delete from StreetName n where n.object.id=?
delete from StreetNameTranslation where translatable.id in ( select id from StreetName n where n.object.id=? )
select distinct n from StreetName n left join fetch n.object left join fetch n.translations where n.id=?
